title: The Clouds of Izmah
description: In the second tale of the Max series, Prince Max, realizing no one has an answer for King Randrewâ€™s failing health seizes upon an unlikely legend as a desperate hope to save his father. He begins a secret quest to find the Wizard of Doonadim at the end of the world. Facing many tests of his courage and purpose, he steps unknowingly into the mystical cloud kingdom of Izmah. There he learns powerful truths of himself and the great challenge of bringing the bitter wizard back into a world of hidden dangers and enemies.
author: David W. Walker
